summary: Medical/case management app with calendar views and case management features. User is iteratively adding features including icon updates and calendar improvements.

existing_features.title: Replace the IconHisto SVG with a side-profile (lateral view) microscope illustration. The new SVG should clearly depict a microscope viewed from the side, with a visible eyepiece, arm, stage, and base, retaining the existing `histo` color token.

Replace the IconLabs SVG with a test tube illustration. The new SVG should clearly depict a single test tube (elongated cylinder closed at the bottom, open or capped at the top), retaining the existing `labs` color token.

Make each case card in the weekly calendar view (CalendarCaseCard) a clickable link that navigates the user to the Cases page and highlights or focuses the corresponding case. Clicking anywhere on the card body (excluding individual workflow icon toggles) should trigger navigation to the Cases view.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add 'Daily Summary' task to all +New Case buttons and pages: default unchecked, tear-off calendar page icon, navy blue color
Add last name to Calendar view
Increase text size and decrease icon size on Calendar view
Change histo icon to side-view microscope and labs icon to test tube
Link calendar cards to Case info page when clicked
